message: Let's start fair. I get the majority, you get a small share, but at least we're both getting something!
You got lucky last round, but I'm not giving you the majority this time!
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving you everything. Let's split the difference from the last round.
You're not willing to give me much, but I'll take what I can get for now!
I'm getting a bit concerned about the inflation, let's get a deal before it eats away more of our money.  This is a fair compromise.
It's getting late, let's split it down the middle before it's too late!
